The best ramen ever!
Very Good!
My Japanise favourite
A bit too rich and fat to me, but I agree this is very popular food, especially in the western part of Japan (Kyushu island).

Tonkotsu ramen has such a unique, creamy broth. The bamboo shoots, nori, corn, and soft eggs go so well paired with the broth and the meat. The meat just melts in your mouth, and some of the vegetables are kept somewhat crispy to make a dish with a lot going on in it.

"Un plato que une a familias peruanas y es una de las mejores que se puede comer" 1 0
"Me encanta" 1 0

"Ive cooked this in a traditional oven, and it doesnt give the same result as a chicken roast, so a charcoal oven is necessary. Whether with wood or charcoal, the sensation of the embers and the smoke create a unique flavor on the chickens skin. I recommend serving it with a fresh vegetable salad like sliced tomato, sliced gherkins, and shredded lettuce, accompanied by a balsamic vinaigrette. For the fries, I recommend thin fries seasoned only with salt (and maybe a little garlic powder). For the chicken, every chef has their own recipe; I recommend charcoal over wood, as the smoke from the logs overpowers the other flavors. Serve with mayonnaise, ketchup, salsa golf, and aji amarillo. For a drink, an Inka-Cola or fresh fruit juice. Best restaurant in Lima (top 15 best food cities): Granja Azul Best restaurant in Arequipa (top 96 best food cities): El Pollo Real If youre planning a feast featuring "Pollo a la brasa", I recommend the following dishes in the following order: Glass of water to open up space in your stomach and improve digestion. First Course: Escribano Second Course: Anticuchos Main Course: Pollo a la brasa Dessert: Strawberry or Passion Fruit Cheesecake" 1 0

Some recipes suggest using pancetta (or even bacon) instead guanciale, because the latter is difficult to find outside Italy, but guanciale has a specific & unique flavor, making it essential to the dish. If you cant find guanciale order it through Amazon -- its worth doing!

The boiled main lobster is the pinnacle of sea food. This is sea food done right it is hard to imagine a sea food greater than this. Lobster has set sea food up for greatness and we shouldnt accept anything else.

The boiled main lobster is the pinnacle of sea food. This is sea food done right it is hard to imagine a sea food greater than this. Lobster has set sea food up for greatness and we shouldnt accept anything else.
Its very epic. Best for breakfast.l
Creamy miracle
Bougatsa is our traditional breakfast. If prepared with love, it can be an unforgettable experience. My go to choices are with white cheese or cream.
Tried this at a greek store in London, Broadway Market, this one had a cream/custard filling, not bad!
I can eat this any time of the day. In the morning, after dinner or at night after going out. The combination of vanilla pudding and cinnamon just works wonders.
Its very epic. Best for breakfast.l
